entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
